Title: Warriors of Kudlak (1)
Plot: Sarah Jane (Elisabeth Sladen) and Maria (Yasmine Paige) investigate the mysterious disappearance of local boy Lance Metcalf, and soon discover that a number of children have gone missing across the country. Remarkably, the disappearances all occurred during freak storms and in cities that are home to a laser tag game called Combat 3000. As Sarah Jane and Maria delve deeper into the mystery, Luke (Tommy Knight) and Clyde (David Anthony) are off enjoying a game of Combat 30?
GuestStars: Chook Sibtain, Sarah Haynes, Pamela Merrick, Sonny Muslim, James Bellamy, Nadiyah Davis, Chrissie Furness, Paul Kasey, Paul Kasey, Paul Kasey, Silas Carson, Silas Carson, Tina Greatex
